actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of July 2, 1940, as amended, to remove the limit on appropriations.

summary.text: Removes the limit on the amount authorized to be appropriated for the administration of provisions setting aside Barro Colorado Island in the Panama Zone for scientific observation and investigation and for the maintenance of laboratory and other facilities establshed to carry out such research.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of July 2, 1940, as amended, to remove the limit on appropriations.
